title: Arboreal Galois groups of rational maps with nonreal Julia sets
abstract:
We prove a non-abelian arboreal Galois group result for certain maps with
non-real Julia set at an archimedean place. We investigate the question of
determining which polynomials defined over $\mathbb{R}$ have real Julia set.
Finally we show that for some certain classes of Latt\`es maps associated to
the duplication map on an elliptic curve has non-abelian arboreal Galois
groups.
